tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I met Dr Chakradhar Reddy after my knee fracture in April 2017. It was a type 6 fracture with separation with multiple fractures in tibial plateau and crack going to 1/3rd the length of tibia, with displacement. Dr Reddy stabilized the knee with plate and screws once the swelling subsided and then the recovery period started. Right from the starting it was clear that the fracture was pretty complex. Knee surgery was successful and no complications arose . What helped us was the confidence of doctor and explanation of what was happening and discussion about what to expect next at each stage. The recovery is still ongoing but I am in much better condition now and am much more confident now. Fracture recoveries are long drawn processes and you need a doctor who has the expertise and is responsive. Dr Reddy has both these qualities.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Reddy is a fantastic person and a real doctor who has got sympathy , empathy and compassion towards the patients. He diagnosed my condition **** ********** and explained the procedure in detail and made me very comfortable. I am very happy to undergo my shoulder rotator cuff tear operation . After Dr. Reddy’s consultation I am  confident that he will do good surgery to my shoulder and I have got a Date for the operation. 
I recommend Dr. Reddy to any one who has got shoulder problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr. Chakradhar when my right 
full shoulder elevation was restricted after an accident. He is a young dynamic doctor with much experience in his field. 

He got operated at Apollo kondapur center. After a month I started doing physio exercises as advised by Dr. Sir.
I am completely satisfied with his treatment.
Sir is a very polite person and treats patient very nicely. 
He is doctor you can completely trust and put into his hands without any fear. 
Highly recommend for any ortho related problem.

I have a torn ACL and this is the 3rd Doctor that I visited (30 Aug 2016) to get the opinion regarding my ACL Reconstruction. The Doctor came 30 minutes late to the schedule appointment time. I was the first patient and when I have been asked to enter his cabin for consultation, their was a person already sitting (not a patient) inside. I found this really unprofessional and unethical. He was in rush and very little attentive to my case. He has done the primary observation of my knee with the Lachman Test only for my injured knee (supposed to be done as well for the other knee to understand the slackness). Before he provide his view on the diagnosis, he asked for my MRI report and said you need to go under knife (i.e.ACL Reconstruction), which is mention in the MRI report in clear English. 

Secondly I have been asked to pay Rs. 500/- as consultation (as asked by the receptionist) fee while the receipt shows a consultation charge of Rs. 300/- from the clinic on 7th September. I have written the same to the doctor as a reply to the email of receipt and still waiting for the reply from the doctor.

Thanks.
Dr. Sudhansu Sahoo (PhD)

He is very best doctor, I attended him for my finguers fracture and he diaognsed superbly and patiently. He gives lot of Confidence to patients and treat carefully. For people who have fear he takes more responsible and handle them with lots of care. I request everyone who wants to visit ortho related issue please visit him you will definitely feel good and please suggest your friend. He has good experience in handling children, he takes at most care as a parent. 
He is very best doctor, I attended him for my finguers fracture and he diaognsed superbly and patiently. He gives lot of Confidence to patients and treat carefully. For people who have fear he takes more responsible and handle them with lots of care. I request everyone who wants to visit ortho related issue please visit him you will definitely feel good and please suggest your friend. He has good experience in handling children, he takes at most care as a parent.

I consulted  Dr Chakradhar at the recommendation of my friend to get treatment to my mother's knee pain.
Doctor spent enough time with us and clarified all our doubts. Performed knee cap replacement for my mother. During operation my mother felt very comfortable in the hands of this experienced doctor. 
Prescribed only a very few tablets for a week use after the operation. 
Before operation my mother was unable to walk even a few steps. No my mom is able walk witjout any pain and also ablw to climb ateps.
My mom could not stop thanking everyday this young & experienced docotor.
We are highly satisfied with his treatment.

Doctor is kind but I felt that he has not given proper attention  to me as a patient. I met with an accident 1 day before meeting him. I got mild injuries and also some fracture in 3rd foot finger. My father is a doctor and I already got my foot xray so that dignosis could be easy. When I visited the doctor he said there is no fracture and he even didn't see my xray properly.
After that I told him my father is a orthopaedician and then he told me that some mild fracture is visible. After that gave some treatment. But I doubt on doctor. Weather he has given proper medicines or not.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Chakradhar explained the problem in detail along with a more detailed explanation of how the treatment will proceed. He did my ligament reconstruction surgery and treated a fracture in my knee bone. The overall experience and friendliness with which he treated me during the course of three weeks was very helpful to put me and my family at ease. I'd recommend Dr Chakradhar for any ortho related problems in Hyderabad

Hi 
I'm having shoulder and hand pain since 8 months.i went to doctor B.chakradhar Reddy sir for last 3 days back for consultation.really now I'm not getting pain in  shoulder*** ******* ******* ******** *** **.Im very happy to share this.Thank u very much sir
reply_text: very happy to hear ; and u are a nice and pleasant patient as well

my dad got a bad shoulder injury and he got a retracted tear of his right shoulder muscle ; and the doctor dis an arthroscopic key hole surgery; and he recovered well and got better in 4 months time ; he is very happy with his shkhkder problem as it is cured well; I recommend well to all my patients; 
no money minded doctor

attended the doctor for a shoulder problem with pain and can't reach back and lift up ; 
doctor diagnosed my condition and requested scan and did a key hole surgery on my shoulder ; it took 3 months to completely recover but inam very happy to say that i am doing very well and shoulder is completely normal now ; I strongly recommend the doctor ; very kind and dynamic ; skillfull ; well stuffed

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went with my mother for her knee pain. Doctor listens to the issue carefully and patiently. He gave sufficient time to us. Medication provided too was quite helpful in subsiding the pain. Only problem being is the wait time, even after taking an appointment beforehand, usual wait time is over an hour due to rush. Once I had to wait from 8pm till 11:30pm, so plan accordingly before visit.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My daughter is 12 year old who had a ligament tear. When I visited the doctor he advised for the mandated surgery. As a second opinion I consulted Dr. *** ****** ** ******** *** *** *** ******** ** ***** **** *** ******* *** *** ********* *** *** ******* ** ** ******** ** ***** ** ** **** **** ***** *** ***** ** *** *** **** *** ***** ******** Today after 6 weeks my daughter is able walk without the surgery. ******** ** *** ******* *** *** **************

Based on appointment confirmation reached hospital on time early morning and that to on festival day
But it was really frustrating to hear that today doctor is not available 
In that case there is no answer from staff that why practo provided confirmation and reminding messages about appointment 

Not at all acceptable 
Now the question how can we further depend on the credibility and reliability of the practo app

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was pissed off as Apollo charged me more than what was shown in practo. However docter was uber friendly and explained me the issue with lot of patience. Cleared all my miss conceptions and explained me what the real problem was. The medication he prescribed did solve my back pain in just a day. I am very much thankful to the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great experience. Excellent staff, highly knowledgeable and very friendly.He was very professional, a good listener and provided me with excellent service for my medical condition.“Dr. Chakri is an excellent doctor who knows exactly what he is doing and knows what his patients need each time .I admire his courage, empathy and hard work.”

I visit to Mr.Readdy with a collar bone fracture he diagnose and suggested for a surgery, distinguish the different quality of plates and make, and reflecting the cost of treatment. I was convince to go with Switzerland made plates was best for my condition ********* ** ****** ****** **** ********* *** ******** ******* ** ****** I am comfort and strongly refer to all my friends and relatives for any kind of ortho compliance.

Sir You diagnosed me with +ve Kanavel's sign while I met you yesterday at Apollo. Its been 24 hrs since then I have taken 12 tabs prescribed by you. No improvement so far..

Is it supposed to be like this or I'm missing something. Pls suggest. 

Thanks 
Chandan

Best doctor I attended recently for my finger fracture. You can just keep firing whatever question comes to your mind, he answers them very patiently, and makes you to understand the real problem. The doctor himself does the dressing and so obviously its pretty good compared to a nurse/assistant doing it.
Highly recommended.

I have visited this doctor at Madinaguda clink few days ago , extremely plesant and good clinical skills 
His examination of my knee is good and made a quick conclusion of my condition , 
 Gave me a course of 2 months tablet and Physio which worked well for me 
And I can suggest him to my friends , as he is available in the clinic after 6 pm and office holders his timing are handy

II am a sports person, I inured my knee while on a bike accident and was told that I have ripped a ligament in the knee , I always had difficulty in Coming down and climbing steps , I underwent arthroscopic ligament reconstruction with the Doctor and i am glad to say that I completely recovered and able to do all my work normallt  without fear and pain .

I sincerely thank the doctor for making me better and I don't have any hesitation to recommend this doctor to anyone.

I met an accident in July  2015 as a result I was unable sit/walk.
I consulted Dr Chakri who has performed my hip replacement operation. Within 2 months Now I am able to go for regular walk, do my regular jobs able drive car etc.
No one is able to notice that I am now living with  an artificial hip.
I am very pleased with his service during and post operation follow up services. Cosy of operation is also very reasonable for that high quality professionalism.

I consulted Dr Chakradhar regarding my shoulder problem ,which is not cured after been medication for 6months.After his carefull assessment and medicine prescribed by him my shoulder pain is totally cured.
I will recommend this doctor to all my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I travelled from Bengaluru to Hyd and got recommendation from one friend. Dr. did the initial diagnosis and identified problems. Later provided medication and explained the treatment plan and he also explained what all diagnosis procedure available and best suited with expense involved. I am feeling benefit within  10 days as of today my problem is still not completely fixed but I can see signeficant improvement. I know the joint problem and issues like Teniss elbow don't get fixed overnight but the relief from pain and improvements are well noticed.Thanks doctor for good work.

Doctors response is really good. Has tons of patience to clarify all questions. He doesn't suggest medical tests unless there is any need. Have visited his clinic for my shoulder slap tear, elbow problem. Also visited for my wife long standing knee injury, doctors advice and suggestions have helped recovery.

The doctor is very experienced. I was suffering from knee pain and fever for which some other doctors advised of surgery however, that was not required. He suggested good medication and did not suggest any tests straight away. I took the medicine and recovered. I would like to thank the docter for his time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: On the first go Diagnosis of knee problem was spot on and same is confirmed after MRI. Operation was very smooth and with in few days I started walking. Awesome experience!!!

review:
** ****** ** *** **** *********** ******* ** ***** *** ** *********************** ********* ******  Highly qualified with a lot of experience.  He listens to your problems patiently and advises the right course of treatment.
Thank you Dr. Chakri.
I have attended this doc for a leg pain , I felt he diagnosed my problem well and I got relieved with the course of treatment he gave
In simple words he is genuine, patient, positive, friendly. He explained me every thing regarding surgery and what actually he is doing clearly and responds to what every doubt we are having.

Very bad experience with SLG Hospitals for each patient they take 20min for billing and no proper supervision. After taking xray they wont provide physical copy they directly send it to doctors phone. With toe pain they make walk 2floors for xray. I would never suggest this hospital. My first and last visit this is going to be. There are faar better hospitals dont want time here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: First thing we like was that the doctor was on time, which I think is the biggest plus point for the patients. And he took enough time to explain things . Two points which all the patients look forward to while choosing a doctor. We r happy with the over all experience.

Appointment was cancelled and we were asked to come again on Monday. No clear information on when to come etc were provided. Would have been better if they've told whether we can come at same time or any other mutually agreeable time where we need not book appointment again
He is very good Doctor.visited for ankle fracture.  Gave good medicines and provided motivation to walk quickly. Fully recovered ** ******
Good and nice explanation about the problem.good receiving and nice interaction with paient.,............
Good experience, nice doctor patiently listen the problem, and with out referring to any diagnosis tests he has started treatment, very less medicines written.

He is an excellent and Genius Doctor. He has done knee replacement for my mom and she is doing absolutely good after surgery. He understands patient's issue very well. A Big "thank you"
 Doctor.
Very nice and patience to listen what is the exact problem of patients. Explanation is also good what is cause Nd why its happening...
Doctor Chakri has physically stretched my legs to understand the problem and guided me how to overcome it. He clearly explained the problem i was experiencing  and suggested the medicines.
Wonderful experience. Would definitely recommend. Explained clearly the issue and avoided having an operation.
Well received. Took a detailed observation of the problem. Suggested the diagnosis. He has a good understanding of the problems and thus provided medical advice.
The case has clearly examined my case and diagnosed the problem and  suggested proper treatment please
Very nice and excellent. Doctor is very friendly and patiently listening to the problems of patients. Not suggested unnecessary tests.
Interaction was simple and good. He was really patient and suggested medicines and as well some background of the problem.

My mother went through surgery for her wrist. But the wrist do not bend atleast as such before it used to. Instead she has undergone severe pain for the surgery. What he promised before was not at all done and my mother is still suffering.
reply_text:
So sorry not to live up to your expectation Rakesh ; as far as I remember I have done a trapezoidal osteotomy 2 years ago for malunited wrist fracture which was 4 months old initially managed with bonesetters ; wrist 
 deformity was promised to correct and we got corrected it and I got the pre and post op pictures to confirm this ; wrist moments are same or slightly better than the pre operations level ; I feel so sorry and devastated for treating with utmost care and dedication as I normally do with all my patients ; I would welcome a qualified  orthopedic second opinion for to confirm or refute my treatment ;

review: Excellent. Doctor is very receptive and spends a good amount of time with the patient to understand the exact problem. Highly qualified and has done practice in foreign countries earlier, and hence has a very caring attitude.
